Events

Run for Life July 16, 2016 at 9:00am

The Run For Life 5k Run/Walk benefits organizations in WNY who help women choose life for their unborn child. This year all registration monies will be donated to the Southtowns Care Center.

Details Register

Light the Night August 11, 2016 at 6:30pm

Southtowns Care Center's 2016 free annual candle-lighting benefit, Light the Night, features seasoned international pro-life speaker Stephanie Gray. Come to hear her speak and stay for the food trucks and free live music.

Contact Information

Southtowns Care Center, Inc.
P.O. Box 892, Hamburg, NY 14075
(716) 508-0660
info@southcc.org
@southtownscc

Southtowns Care Center will provide free pregnancy verification and confirmation via a laboratory quality urine test. We are not an abortion clinic and we do not refer for abortions.

Because we believe that everyone should have access to the services and information we provide, all of our services are free and confidential. Services are offered to you whether you are single or married, regardless of age, race, or religion. The services provided by SCC are not substitutes for prenatal care or professional counseling.

© Southtowns Care Center, Inc. All rights reserved.
